title: Huckleberry
subtitle: Rafal Bojar Photographer
header: Huckleberry app is a science’s solution to a good night’s sleep.
Developed by sleep experts, data scientists, and parents, Huckleberry learns about your sleep situation.
Huckleberry gives you an evidence-based program designed personally for your child and family that will change the way you sleep.

content.header: Huckleberry is the baby tracker that grows with your child.
paragraphs: Huckleberry team is one of my oldest clients for whom I’ve done a lot of great things. We started off with the mobile app design for their baby tracker, which is the only app that predicts the next optimal nap in real-time using the power of AI to make bedtime stress free and provide healthier sleep for the whole family!

content.header: Huckleberry app is really enjoyed by parents who have given it an average score of 4,8/5 on the AppStore.
paragraphs: In addition to the mobile app design, I was also really glad to help Huckleberry team with the website redesign as well as AppStore promo video creation. Our main goal was to make both things very cute yet informative for parents to use with pleasure.
